title: How to View Saved Posts on Reddit on PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://www.reddit.com and sign in.
steps.content: Go to https://www.reddit.com and sign in. You'll need to be signed in to your Reddit account to view your saved posts.

steps.title: You'll see your username and avatar at the top-right.
steps.content: You'll see your username and avatar at the top-right. This expands a menu.

steps.title: The Profile option is at the top of the menu.
steps.content: The Profile option is at the top of the menu. This displays an overview of your Reddit profile.

steps.title: The SAVED tab is at the top of your profile near the center.
steps.content: The SAVED tab is at the top of your profile near the center. Any posts you've saved while browsing Reddit appear here. To remove a thread from your saved list, click unsave beneath its title.
